Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz1001.jpg'}
{3: 'Babylonia, Civilian Area.'}
{3: 'UT. 19:15. The battle between the space station and Babylonia is about to commence.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Selena mentioned "the real world."'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: '"Outside the peaceful and harmonious world we lived in, there was another cruel world full of conflict and war."'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'What is it like? Will I be able to paint it out?'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'You must be fighting there, Selena.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'If your fight is about life and death, I must carry on with mine. We will be fine.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'I will paint your fight so your story can be heard!'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Will I be able to understand you then...?'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: '...Must set the tone first... The colors of the universe... And stars...'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: '...Hmm... Something like this?'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "...Now... Selena's fighting stance..."}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: '...Oh, those boys probably know better...'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: '... (Busy drawing)'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: '...Flames, explosions, laser beam... How about that?'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Done!'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "...No. Something's not right. I have seen many artworks depicting war. It's not like this."}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Is this too naive...?'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "More like a landscape painting. I can only feel the beauty of the starry sky and Selena's grace... Too bright? Too light-hearted? Hmm, the vibe is just too far off!"}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'If I take this to someone, the only answers I\'ll get will be "this is a child\'s imagination," or "this doesn\'t resemble war at all."'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: '...Have I hit a bottleneck? Is there something that cannot be represented by painting...?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg901_5.jpg'}
{3: 'A swarm of aircraft leave the space station, charging toward Babylonia in the orbit.'}
{3: 'Cannons start firing. Cruise missiles are launched. Just like that, the war begins.'}
{3: "Meanwhile, Babylonia's plan is being executed."}
{3: 'As more fighter aircrafts leave the port, the special task force also departs.'}
{3: 'According to the plan, they will be escorted near the space station before landing, and investigate the internal facilities.'}
{3: 'Apart from military and research-related intelligence, they also want to retrieve the relics left by humans in the old times.'}
{3: 'Even normal objects for daily use could turn into antiques with incredible value.'}
{3: 'Step by step, humans evolved over time. As a whole, and as individuals.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'I heard sounds...! The battle has started!'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Selena... I hope she will be fine.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Oh, what's that...!"}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz1002.jpg'}
{3: "Ayla witnesses the battle through Babylonia's barrier."}
{3: 'Flames, explosions, aircraft debris.'}
{3: 'The cruel scene shocks her as if time had stopped.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Is this... war?'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'This is nothing like I imagined... Red lights, yellow dust, cold and dark space...'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'The starry sky used to be beautiful. Why does it suddenly look so harsh...'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Those debris must have come from aircraft. Maybe even Constructs.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "If a person is hit in this battle... There won't be any remains left at all."}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: '...I understand now. Compared to this, my own interpretation of war is so naive and simple.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'People can die any time. War could break out at any time. This is the reality we live in.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Unlike the peaceful cities. Unlike games, where I can restart after death...'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "If one can't appreicate the cruelty of the world, then I supposed they never be able to capture the reality of war with their paint brush..."}
